pull.title: Introduce GetFileArg and use it where possible
pull.body:
Follow-up to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24265

~Marking as draft until https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24265 is merged as this PR builds on top of that PR~

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24266](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24266) (util: Avoid buggy std::filesystem:::create_directories() call by hebasto)
* [#23732](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23732) (refactor: Remove `gArgs` from `bdb.h` and `sqlite.h` by kiminuo)
* [#17783](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17783) (util: Fix -norpcwhitelist, -norpcallowip, and similar corner case behavior by ryanofsky)
* [#17581](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17581) (refactor: Remove settings merge reverse precedence code by ryanofsky)
* [#17580](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17580) (refactor: Add ALLOW_LIST flags and enforce usage in CheckArgFlags by ryanofsky)
* [#17493](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17493) (util: Forbid ambiguous multiple assignments in config file by ryanofsky)
* [#16545](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16545) (refactor: Implement missing error checking for ArgsManager flags by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Introduce GetFileArg

tree ca7f2a5411613412d86d550ceb40deac9250fd28
parent 42688109b38063902f4c2621db3e465a3c9b2218
author Pavol Rusnak <pavol@rusnak.io> 1644086193 +0100
committer Pavol Rusnak <pavol@rusnak.io> 1644443783 +0100

Use GetFileArg where possible

events.body: Concept ACK, but I think PR description should be clearer. Also, I think it would be better to drop the first commit 42688109b38063902f4c2621db3e465a3c9b2218 here, and substitute commit b00c0c2a73b3c443f78b74eee60ff3e401b0269f from #24306. Main reason is that I think it is confusing to have separate `GetPathArg` and `GetFileArg` methods which are exactly the same except one strips trailing slashes and one doesn't. I don't think it's likely we will have a need for the one which preserves trailing slashes. The commit from the other PR also adds unit test coverage.
Let's close this in favor of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24306

comments.body: `pathlike_arg` is in snake case notation, `pathDefault` is in camel case notation.
Right. Left review on the PR this PR builds on: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24265#pullrequestreview-874013646
